r.s: PHP's asynchronous concurrent distributed networking framework
r.d: PHP's asynchronous concurrent distributed networking framework. - Event-driven - Asynchronous non-blocking - Multi-Thread reactor - Multi-Process worker - Millisecond timer - Asynchronous MySQL - AsyncTask workers
r.n: - Added connection out_buffer - Added async file read/write - Added async dns lookup - Added long tcp connection - Added client timer - Added swoole_server->sendfile - Added signalfd usage - Fixed some bugs
